title: How to Spot a Leo Woman: 14 Things You Need to Know

steps.title: If her hair makes you do a double-take, she’s probably a Leo.
steps.content: If her hair makes you do a double-take, she’s probably a Leo . No matter its color, texture, or style, there’s just something about her locks. If you know her haircare routine is at least ten steps long, consider that a sign. Look out for the gal with hair Aphrodite would envy—because chances are, she’s a Leo.

steps.title: Rain or shine, expect the Leo in your life to look totally perfect.
steps.content: Rain or shine, expect the Leo in your life to look totally perfect. She’ll show up just a little overdressed—but trust that that’s intentional. Note the girl who’s never got her fly undone, shirt stained, or lipstick on her teeth. Instead, think of the one who shows up to every date, party, or workday looking like she stepped out of a magazine. That's probably a Leo.

steps.title: A Leo’s personal style philosophy is go big or go home.
steps.content: A Leo’s personal style philosophy is go big or go home. Take note of the woman who’s always serving major, groundbreaking looks. If she wore leopard print or sequins on your first date, that's a sign. Or, maybe she's just always ahead of the next trends. Looking average is totally unacceptable to her. So, search for the girl who dons all the hottest, wildest, and most striking fits.

steps.title: Leo ladies just can’t help it—they’re too magnetic to be ignored.
steps.content: Leo ladies just can’t help it—they’re too magnetic to be ignored. At every soiree, she’s got the spotlight. Search for that woman who’s ultra-charismatic, who draws others in like it’s her job. Look out for the girl who always has a crowd of admirers surrounding her at the party, hanging off her every word. She’s the first to clink her glass, rise, and give a completely tear-inducing toast. That’s a Leo. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Leo women are performers at heart.
steps.content: Leo women are performers at heart. In conversation with a Leo woman, expect hand gestures, emotional expressions, and dramatic pauses galore. Look for the girl who can turn a story about going to the DMV into a dramatic tale of tragic loss. She’s the best storyteller, actress, and comedian you know—because Leo women know how to dramatically work a crowd. [2] X Research source

steps.title: You know that woman who’s the definition of self-assured?
steps.content: You know that woman who’s the definition of self-assured? That’s a Leo. As a sun-ruled sign, she knows her worth. Search for the girl who never doubles back on what she’s said and never talks down about herself. Reflect on how she never has a problem approaching her crush. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. And if they're uninterested, she's confused—not disheartened (She might say, I don't get it. What's not to like? ).

steps.title: Leo women are the courageous superheroes in your life.
steps.content: Leo women are the courageous superheroes in your life. She’s a fire sign, so she won't wait around. She'll take action. When everyone else is afraid to take on a task, she steps up to the plate. Think of the girl who'll tell the waiter if they got your meal wrong. When someone toxic is causing trouble, pay attention to the woman who confronts them. That’s Leo energy.

steps.title: If you’ve got a Leo on your team, you’ll always be just fine.
steps.content: If you’ve got a Leo on your team, you’ll always be just fine. Look out for the girl who’ll deliver venomous takedowns on behalf of the people she cares about. At the same time, she's got a shoulder for you to cry on whenever you need it. That’s a Leo. As a fixed sign, the dependable Leo woman is the MVP of your friend group and the most loyal partner around.

steps.title: Leo women will do a lot of things, but sugarcoating isn’t one of them.
steps.content: Leo women will do a lot of things, but sugarcoating isn’t one of them. Search for that girl who isn’t afraid to tell you what you don’t want to hear. She's the one you won’t want to see on laundry day—because she’ll have thoughts on your outfit. Think of that woman who, as kind as she is, can’t stand dishonesty. In all likelihood, you’ve got yourself a Leo.

steps.title: Warm and magnetic, a Leo will unite her friends for every occasion.
steps.content: Warm and magnetic, a Leo will unite her friends for every occasion. Leos are absolutely lovable—so when she’s the one sending out the invites, everyone shows up. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Take note of that friend who wants everyone to have a place in the conversation. Make note of that girl who includes quieter people, reigns in impolite people, and makes sure everyone is having an incredible time.

steps.title: Expressive and intuitive, Leo women are artists at heart.
steps.content: Expressive and intuitive, Leo women are artists at heart. Look out for the girl who had that shockingly moving screenplay, unique sculpture, or insightful short story. Or, think of that woman who may not practice art herself, but always has the most thoughtful take on movies, books, and music. If creative thought is second nature to her, that could definitely be a Leo. [5] X Research source

steps.title: A Leo woman will want to give everything to the people she cares about.
steps.content: A Leo woman will want to give everything to the people she cares about. She’s all about sharing, giving sweet gifts, and saving you the last bite of her cake. To Leo, what’s hers is yours. Think of that girl who consistently gives the most incredible gifts. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. She’s never stingy with her stuff. Phone chargers, clothes, and her cozy blanket—it’s all meant to be shared with those special to her. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Leo women wear their hearts on their fabulous, fashionable sleeves.
steps.content: Leo women wear their hearts on their fabulous, fashionable sleeves. At the end of the day, she wants a fairytale romance. [8] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Look out for that girl who believes in love at first sight. Think about that person you know who plans gorgeous, romantic gestures flawlessly. This is the woman who wants nothing more than to love big and be loved right back.

steps.title: Don't let the front fool you, a Leo woman is actually super sensitive.
steps.content: Don't let the front fool you, a Leo woman is actually super sensitive. Behind her fiery and bold personality, you'll find a girl who's sweet, emotional, and super tender. If you're dating or friends with a Leo woman, notice that over time, she'll start to soften up in front of you. Suddenly, she'll be more open about her fears and insecurities—and she may even cry in front of you. This vulnerability is the true sign of a Leo woman.
